entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
